mapper.select: select l.lecture_no, l.lecture_name, u.user_name, l.lecture_afreecaid from (select l2.lecture_no, l2.lecture_name, c2.user_no, l2.lecture_afreecaid from ds_lecture l2, ds_class_list c2 where l2.lecture_no=c2.lecture_no and user_no=#{user_no} and c2.class_status='true') l , ds_class_list c, ds_auth a, ds_user u where l.lecture_no=c.lecture_no and c.user_no=a.user_no and a.user_auth='ROLE_TEACHER' and a.user_no=u.user_no order by lecture_no

select l.lecture_no, l.lecture_name, u.user_name from (select l2.lecture_no, l2.lecture_name, c2.user_no from ds_lecture l2, ds_class_list c2 where l2.lecture_no=c2.lecture_no and user_no=#{user_no} and c2.class_status='false') l , ds_class_list c, ds_auth a, ds_user u where l.lecture_no=c.lecture_no and c.user_no=a.user_no and a.user_auth='ROLE_TEACHER' and a.user_no=u.user_no order by lecture_no

select l.lecture_no, l.lecture_name, u.user_name, l.savedLecImage from (select rownum rn, lecture_no, lecture_name, lecture_afreecaid, savedLecImage from ds_lecture where lecture_no not in (select lecture_no from ds_class_list where user_no=#{user_no}) and rownum<= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) l, ds_class_list c, ds_auth a, ds_user u where l.lecture_no=c.lecture_no and c.user_no=a.user_no and a.user_auth='ROLE_TEACHER' and a.user_no=u.user_no and
rn>(#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount} order by lecture_no

select l.lecture_no, l.lecture_name, l.lecture_description, u.user_name, l.savedlecimage from ds_lecture l , ds_class_list c, ds_auth a, ds_user u where l.lecture_no=c.lecture_no and c.user_no=a.user_no and a.user_auth='ROLE_TEACHER' and a.user_no=u.user_no and l.lecture_no=#{lecture_no}

select count(*) from (select lecture_no, lecture_name, lecture_afreecaid from ds_lecture where lecture_no not in (select lecture_no from ds_class_list where user_no=#{user_no})) l, ds_class_list c, ds_auth a, ds_user u where
l.lecture_no=c.lecture_no and c.user_no=a.user_no and a.user_auth='ROLE_TEACHER' and a.user_no=u.user_no
mapper.insert: insert into ds_class_list (lecture_no, user_no, class_status) VALUES (#{lecture_no}, #{user_no}, 'false')
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM ds_class_list WHERE user_no=#{user_no} and lecture_no=#{lecture_no}
mapper.update: update ds_user set user_email = #{user_email}, user_mobile = #{user_mobile}, user_depart = #{user_depart}, user_pw = #{user_pw} where user_id = #{user_id}

mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ds_qa (qa_no, qa_writer, qa_title, qa_content, qa_date) VALUES (ds_qa_seq.nextval, #{qa_writer}, #{qa_title}, #{qa_content}, sysdate)
SELECT ds_qa_seq.currval from dual
mapper.select: SELECT Q.TQA_NO, Q.TQA_WRITER, Q.TQA_TITLE, Q.TQA_DATE, Q.TQA_replyer, Q.TQA_STATUS FROM DS_TQA Q LEFT OUTER JOIN DS_USER U ON q.tqa_WRITER = u.user_name WHERE USER_NO = #{USER_NO} ORDER BY tqa_no
mapper.insert:

mapper.select: select distinct u.user_name from (select l2.lecture_no, l2.lecture_name, c2.user_no from ds_lecture l2, ds_class_list c2 where l2.lecture_no=c2.lecture_no and user_no=#{user_no} and c2.class_status='true') l , ds_class_list c, ds_auth a, ds_user u where l.lecture_no=c.lecture_no and c.user_no=a.user_no and a.user_auth='ROLE_TEACHER' and a.user_no=u.user_no
